primary_font.name: Arial
primary_font.usage: Body text, navigation, section headers (except Home)

usage_rules.background: Use #050505 for main page background to save energy and fit the 'drone night flight' aesthetic.
usage_rules.cards: Use #111111 for cards/sections with a 1px border of #27272A.
usage_rules.cta: Buttons must be #FF5500 (Electric Orange) with White text. Hover state: Brighten to #FF7733.
usage_rules.text_contrast: Ensure white text on dark backgrounds. Use #A1A1AA for secondary text.

layout.structure: Single Page Application (SPA) with Anchor Navigation

navigation.mobile: Hamburger menu with full-screen dark overlay

hero_section.content: Welcome message about aerial automation startup.
hero_section.background: Dark gradient overlay on drone imagery.

services_section.card_style: Dark bg (#111), subtle orange border on hover, icon top-left.

product_section.visuals: Monospace font for code snippets, green/orange syntax highlighting.

contact_section.form_style: Minimalist inputs, transparent bg with bottom border only.

footer.animation_css: Use SVG path with CSS keyframes for 'wave' effect.

icons.loading_strategy: Import specific icons only to ensure fast loading.

pwa.implementation: Use vite-plugin-pwa or manual service worker registration.

seo.meta_tags: Ensure description and title are dynamic.

performance.images: Use webp format where possible, lazy load below fold.

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for main backgrounds, use solid dark colors (#050505).
Use Electric Orange (#FF5500) strictly for interactive elements and highlights.
ByteBounce font MUST be used on Home section text only.
Waving footer must be smooth and continuous.
All interactive elements must have data-testid attributes.
instructions_to_main_agent:
1. Set up React with Vite and Tailwind.
2. Install 'sass' if needed for complex wave animations, or use pure CSS.
3. Create a 'components/layout/Navbar.jsx' that handles the anchor scrolling.
4. Implement the 'WavingFooter' component using SVG paths.
5. Use the provided image URLs for background/hero sections.
6. Ensure the Service Worker is registered in main.jsx/index.js.
